long_description: The REI Paddler hat for little girls is always ready for a sunny day on the water. It is just the ticket to protect your wee one's face and neck from the sun's powerful rays. Hat is made of lightweight, durable nylon that dries quickly. Polyester mesh panels in the crown increase cooling air circulation. Soft, moisture-wicking knit polyester headband helps keep perspiration away from the eyes. Wide brim provides ample sun protection; hat floats for easy retrieval if dropped in the water. Adjustable, buckle-release chin strap keeps hat on when the wind picks up. Drawstring at the back of the crown adjusts to desired fit.
